actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission and certain independent agencies which regulate banking and thrift institutions to transmit certain reports and other information to the Congress.

summary.text: Provides that whenever the Securities and Exchange Commission, the Federal Reserve Board, the Federal Home Loan Bank Board, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, or the National Credit Union Administration submits (1) a budget estimate or request or, (2) any testimony or comment on legislative matters, to the President or the Office of Management and Budget, such agency shall concurrently transmit a copy of such material to the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission and certain independent agencies which regulate banking and thrift institutions to transmit certain reports and other information to the Congress.
